google_play_reviews.content: The concept of the app is nice and much needed. There are so many bugs to fix though. 1 - There is a lag between devices 2 - It's just syncing play and pause button. If I am on 20 minutes and someone else is on 30 minutes, pause and play is simply resuming where each on is. Ideally it should keep both at the same time in video all the time 3 - 10 secs fast forward and 10 seconds back is much needed feature 4 - When you scroll and jump to specific time in window, your partner should also jump.
Ok I know people have struggled with the subtitles but easy enough the app only takes .txt files so just rename the subtitles file to txt and it will work just perfect

google_play_reviews.content: Was a little skeptical but works amazingly well!
Why is the subtitle selector not working?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Your android should open a new screen for subtitle file selection when you press the "cc" button. Does this not happen? Please post about the issue at: https://github.com/mo3rfan/syncplayer/discussions if you want to continue this discussion.

google_play_reviews.content: Bro the app is cool but how do ur friends join i don't understand.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: You ask your friends to enter the same details as you did to create a server and connect to it. And all of you have to open an identical video to stay in sync. If you need more help, post a question at: https://github.com/mo3rfan/syncplayer/discussions

google_play_reviews.content: A subtitle feature would be nice pls consider
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback and sorry for being late, but version 1.7.1 got the subtitle feature. You can load external .srt files now! :)

google_play_reviews.content: How to invite someone to join room that i created?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: There's no way to invite users through the app. You simply ask them to download the app and create a room with the same details (except for the username) and ask them to connect.

google_play_reviews.content: How to add a friend in my server??? Or How he/she will come to see videos on my server
google_play_reviews.replyContent: You cannot stream your videos. Only "player states" are streamed. Ask the other person to download the app and create a room with the same details as you used to create a room (except for the username field) and ask them to connect to it. If you have further questions, you can post them at https://github.com/mo3rfan/syncplayer/discussions/new
